Installation¶

First make sure that you have git-lfs installed and correcly configured. This is used to download the pretrain models weights that are heavier than 100MB during the librairy installation. This step is not needed to download if you don’t want to load already trained models.

$ git lfs install --skip-repo

Then install the package using pip

$ pip install git+https://github.com/lrobins1/crowd_counting.git
